name: rattled

effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.

short_effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
